file: tmp_【 #百鬼あやめ7周年新衣装3D 】百鬼あやめ７周年記念ライブ  ～天女繚華～ 【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [uRa-uLMea7w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental transition featuring visuals of waterfalls and lotuses.

subtitles.original: 花で一つ、
subtitles.english: One with a flower,

subtitles.original: 鳥で二つ、
subtitles.english: Two with a bird,

subtitles.original: 手打ち鳴らす
subtitles.english: Clapping hands

subtitles.original: 風で三つ、
subtitles.english: Three with the wind,

subtitles.original: 月出て四つ
subtitles.english: Four as the moon appears

subtitles.original: 鳴らす鳴らす......
subtitles.english: Ring it, ring it...

subtitles.original: 花で一つ、
subtitles.english: One with a flower,

subtitles.original: 鳥で二つ、
subtitles.english: Two with a bird,

subtitles.original: 手打ち鳴らす
subtitles.english: Clapping hands

subtitles.original: 風で三つ、
subtitles.english: Three with the wind,

subtitles.original: 月出て四つ
subtitles.english: Four as the moon appears

subtitles.original: 鳴らす鳴らす......
subtitles.english: Ring it, ring it...

subtitles.original: 今は
subtitles.english: Now it is

subtitles.original: 回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ！
subtitles.english: Spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin!

subtitles.original: 華麗に花弁 散らすように
subtitles.english: Like petals scattering brilliantly

subtitles.original: 回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ！
subtitles.english: Spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin, spin!

subtitles.original: 髪も振り乱して
subtitles.english: With hair all disheveled

subtitles.original: 一昨日、昨日、今日と、明日と、明後日と
subtitles.english: The day before yesterday, yesterday, today, tomorrow, and the day after,

subtitles.original: この宴は続く
subtitles.english: This banquet continues

subtitles.original: 踊レ、歌エ、
subtitles.english: Dance, sing,

subtitles.original: 一心不乱に回レ！
subtitles.english: Spin with single-minded devotion!

subtitles.original: 今宵は何曜日？
subtitles.english: What day is tonight?

subtitles.original: 水木金？
subtitles.english: Wed, Thu, Fri?

subtitles.original: 土日月火？
subtitles.english: Sat, Sun, Mon, Tue?

subtitles.original: よー、ぽん！
subtitles.english: Yo, pon!

subtitles.original: らっしゃいな 平は成り
subtitles.english: Welcome, peace is established

subtitles.original: 時が来た 正夢
subtitles.english: The time has come, a dream comes true

subtitles.original: 夢現 夜もすがら
subtitles.english: Between dream and reality, all night long

subtitles.original: 変わりゆくことに 恐れなし
subtitles.english: No fear of changing things

subtitles.original: のっぴきならぬのはごめん
subtitles.english: Pardon me, I can't back out

subtitles.original: 手毬唄うたい
subtitles.english: Singing a ball-bouncing song

subtitles.original: 君たちが誘う
subtitles.english: You all invite me

subtitles.original: やな重に後ろ髪を引かれても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm reluctant to leave the deep mountains

subtitles.original: 進むべきなり
subtitles.english: I must move forward

subtitles.original: 流行り廃うの浮世なら
subtitles.english: If it's a transient world of fashion and decay

subtitles.original: 信ずる者はただ君だけと
subtitles.english: The one I believe in is only you

subtitles.original: 踊り騒ぎや 飲み明かしや
subtitles.english: With wild revelry and drinking all night

subtitles.original: 案ずることなどない この世
subtitles.english: There's nothing to worry about in this world

subtitles.original: 人の世は恨めしい 銭はちゃらちゃら
subtitles.english: The world of men is regrettable, money clinks

subtitles.original: 虚仮威しで混じり合え
subtitles.english: Mingle with empty bluffs

subtitles.original: それそれそれそれ！
subtitles.english: Sore sore sore sore!

subtitles.original: 今を嘆いて昔を愛でても
subtitles.english: Even if you lament the present and cherish the past

subtitles.original: 君の心の内 花の涙川
subtitles.english: Within your heart, a river of flowery tears

subtitles.original: それじゃ敵わん どこへも
subtitles.english: That won't do, wherever you go

subtitles.original: めくるめく舞台に君を連れて
subtitles.english: I'll take you to the dazzling stage

subtitles.original: あまうてなども悲しき
subtitles.english: Even rain and such are sad

subtitles.original: 身勝手なのが世の理か
subtitles.english: Is it the way of the world to be selfish?

subtitles.original: 万人待ちの理想 刻まないでよ
subtitles.english: Don't carve out the ideals everyone waits for

subtitles.original: 刹那な応えなどは 徒ら
subtitles.english: Fleeting answers are in vain

subtitles.original: 僕ら巡り逢うこと まさに一期一会
subtitles.english: Our meeting is truly a once-in-a-lifetime encounter

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも知れぬ 試練連れ添って この手握って
subtitles.english: Trials with unknown bitterness and sweetness, together with you, holding this hand

subtitles.original: 生きづらいこと浮世から
subtitles.english: From this world where it's hard to live

subtitles.original: 旗を掲げよう 宵闇が明く
subtitles.english: Let's raise the flag, the twilight clears into light

subtitles.original: 踊り上がりや 寝れば忘らら
subtitles.english: Dancing and jumping, forget it all when you sleep

subtitles.original: 昔も今も変わらず 浮世
subtitles.english: Past and present, the transient world remains unchanged

subtitles.original: 人の世は嘆かわしい いつだってちゃらちゃら
subtitles.english: The world of men is lamentable, always clinking

subtitles.original: 可笑しさんで笑い合え
subtitles.english: Laugh together at the absurdity

subtitles.original: それそれそれそれ！
subtitles.english: Sore sore sore sore!

subtitles.original: 深まる春も 凍てつく雪の日も
subtitles.english: Both the deepening spring and the freezing snowy days

subtitles.original: 日出ずるすべての 瞬きと見よう
subtitles.english: Let's view them all as fleeting moments of the rising sun

subtitles.original: 彩る色 どこまでも
subtitles.english: Brilliant colors, stretching everywhere

subtitles.original: 曇りなき晴らしを 眺めて
subtitles.english: Gazing at the cloudless landscape

subtitles.original: 明けて花一匁
subtitles.english: Opening Hana-Ichimonme

subtitles.original: 欲しがる 欲しがる 欲しがる声
subtitles.english: The voices wanting, wanting, wanting

subtitles.original: 勝って選んで 飽きないでいて
subtitles.english: Win and choose, please don't get bored

subtitles.original: 猿真似の無礼千万 満ち足りないないない
subtitles.english: Imitation is utterly rude, never satisfied

subtitles.original: 未だ進む道半ばだ
subtitles.english: I'm still halfway through my path

subtitles.original: 如何なる時も歩を前へ出せ
subtitles.english: No matter what, step forward

subtitles.original: 流行り廃うの浮世なら
subtitles.english: If it's a transient world of fashion and decay

subtitles.original: 信ずる者はただ君だけと
subtitles.english: The one I believe in is only you

subtitles.original: 踊り上がりや 飲み明かしや
subtitles.english: With wild revelry and drinking all night

subtitles.original: 案ずることなどない この世
subtitles.english: There's nothing to worry about in this world

subtitles.original: 人の世は恨めしい 銭はちゃらちゃら
subtitles.english: The world of men is regrettable, money clinks

subtitles.original: 虚仮威しで混じり合え
subtitles.english: Mingle with empty bluffs

subtitles.original: それそれそれそれ！
subtitles.english: Sore sore sore sore!

subtitles.original: 今を嘆いて昔を愛でても
subtitles.english: Even if you lament the present and cherish the past

subtitles.original: 君の心の内 花の涙川
subtitles.english: Within your heart, a river of flowery tears

subtitles.original: それじゃ敵わん どこへも
subtitles.english: That won't do, wherever you go
